title: Funko announces upcoming Disney Villains cosmetics collection
text:
Funko, a popular culture collectibles company, is debuting a cosmetics line for the first time based on Disney's most epic villains.

In August, the brand posted a photo that included four makeup collections with a caption that read, "Bring Some Disney Villain Swagger to Your Daily Beauty Routine."

Maleficent, Ursula, the Evil Queen and Cruella de Vil are the four chosen baddies of the latest launch, and fans are already showing lots of excitement for this line.

"Our Funko Pop! and Disney cosmetics collection based on the Disney Villain franchise is another whimsical way for fans, collectors and beauty aficionados to wear, travel with and display their fandom," said Funko Chief Marketing Officer, Molly Hartney in a statement.

"Our unique Pop! aesthetic makes this collaboration highly collectible, with beautiful molded and luxe embellishments that translate the Villains into glamorous trend setting figures," she continued.

The full collection will include four eyeshadow palettes, four lip glosses, four eyeliners, four brush sets, and all products are gluten and cruelty-free.

Prices range from $12 - $24, and the collection will be available at Ulta on Sept. 15.

Disney is the parent company of ABC News.
description: Funko has announced a new cosmetics collection slated to release in September at Ulta.
